tweet: Doing a little marketing.  Trying to get the word out about The Christian Boys - http://ChristianBoys.com
Working on our new song, "Saved By The Lord."  One of the first pop dance Christian songs, and our best song to date!  God Bless!
Finished making a demo for a new pop-hip hop type song.  We don't have an exact name for the song yet, but we think you'll like.  God Bless!
Our entire music system crashed!  Down for a week.  Should be up within the next 3 days.
